column5: Welcome to Smithville Guest Haus in Small Town USA! One block from Main Street featuring shops, restaurants and night life. Close to Round Top/Warrenton, Austin and Circuit of Americas. Take a stroll in town or spend a day in the country seeking out a treasured antique. However you choose to spend your day, know that you will RELAX IN COMFORT at Smithville Guest Haus. We can't wait to have you as our guest(s)! Your hosts, Rob and Sharon
